bibl.title: Sophocles. Selected Fragmentary Plays. Volume II. The Epigoni, Oenomaus, Palamedes, The Arrival of Nauplius, Nauplius and the Beacon, The Shepherds, Triptolemus
bibl.note: Volume I: 2006. - Preface. - General introduction (A.H.S.) [an abridged, adapted and updated version of the corresponding section of volume I]. - References and abbreviations. - The Epigoni or Eriphyle (A.H.S.). - Oenomaus (T.H.T. & A.H.S.). - Palamedes, Nauplios Katapleon (The Arrival of Nauplius) and Nauplios Pyrkaeus (Nauplius and the Beacon) (A.H.S.). - Poimenes (The Shepherds) (A.H.S.). - Triptolemus (T.H.T. & A.H.S.). - Addenda to volume I. - Index to volumes I and II.
bibl.seg: Alan H. Sommerstein & Thomas H. Talboy (with Introductions, Translations and Commentaries by), Sophocles. Selected Fragmentary Plays. Volume II. The Epigoni, Oenomaus, Palamedes, The Arrival of Nauplius, Nauplius and the Beacon, The Shepherds, Triptolemus = Aris & Phillips Classical Texts.

Volume I: 2006. - Preface. - General introduction (A.H.S.) [an abridged, adapted and updated version of the corresponding section of volume I]. - References and abbreviations. - The Epigoni or Eriphyle (A.H.S.). - Oenomaus (T.H.T. & A.H.S.). - Palamedes, Nauplios Katapleon (The Arrival of Nauplius) and Nauplios Pyrkaeus (Nauplius and the Beacon) (A.H.S.). - Poimenes (The Shepherds) (A.H.S.). - Triptolemus (T.H.T. & A.H.S.). - Addenda to volume I. - Index to volumes I and II.
C.R. par Laura Carrara, Gnomon 88 (2016) pp. 581-592. - Helen Gasti, CR N.S., 66 (2016) pp. 333-335.
